content.detailedDescription: Im tired of this part    new years eve i and my dog wife and sister inlaw all credible witnessed minimum 22 home sized extra terrestrial crafts bots and beings ive already gave a personal testimony to the director and will do so again upon field investigation day im exasted explaining it in the same breath id like to express my grattitude to the director for being there when i reached for help with this it was an unexpected visit and he acomidated me and my testimony with the upmost professionalism thats indicitive of his position and my opinion thers enough people that have been per say to battle with this issue they and they only should be dealing with this and these issues not  people that decide ther interested in it
content.summary: Allready had lengthy meeting with you guys at new port beach

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 22:20 hrs. i was looking out over the atlantic ocean and noticed a bright light. at first i thought it was aircraft making and approach headed west toward me. it looking like there were lights blinking. then i noticed it wasn't moving , so i thought it might be a planet. then i noticed a red light as well as a white light, so i got my binoculars and when i focused in on it i saw a green light as well. the lights were blinking in sequence. i watched it for approximately 20 minutes. i went inside and came back about a half hour later and it was gone.
content.summary: It was approximately 22:20 hrs. i was looking out over the atlantic ocean and noticed a bright light. at first i thought it was aircraft making and approach headed west toward me. it looking like there were lights blinking. then i noticed it wasn't moving

content.detailedDescription: Well, i was lying in bed trying to fall asleep when i heard a helicopter in my bedroom w/ some backround noise. since i am not that much of a ufo expert,so i was kind of scared to take a look. so i got out of bed, got my glasses on and i looked.There were yellow light in sky. first, i thought they were stars but they started moving all around. there were 5 of them. there was some smoke in the area too. it was a great watch. all they did was move gracfully in the sky while the helicopter flew.I felt really good and i thought the sight was wonderful. soon some clouds came in and vanished and that's how i lost the ufos.
content.summary: I wittnessed 5 ufos w/ an helicopter in the sky in waldorf, md on march 3rd, 2014. it was about as big as an star

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our way to tupelo. we headed down hwy 45 south. when we were between tupelo and saltillo i noticed 3 bright white lights. i thought it looked disc like at that point. i pointed it out to my husband that was driving. we slowed down ans began to watch it because the lights were so brightly glowing white. it was in the distance at this point. it quickly changed direction and altitude. as it began coming toward the highway (east)where we were. it appeared to have some sort of light "drop" out of it. like a raindrop of light. we turned to each other and said, "did you see that? are you seeing this?" my husband said we need to get a picture of it because no one would believe this. we slowed down even move and came to stop on the highway (not on the side of the highway because we were so captivated by this) as it passed overhead in front of us. i did not grab my phone for a picture because i was afraid i would miss something incredible. as it got closer we could tell it had 4 lights in fact. 3 bright white glowing lights. not blinking. and 1 tiny red light that was in the bottom center of the craft. we were able to make out a black structure with a triangle shape. we did not see wings on the object. it just had the triangle shape. we thought if it were an airplane it would not have been able to turn around like it did before, it would have a blinking light on it somewhere and would not go so slowly over us it had slowed down when it passed over us. there was no noise like a helicopter. i did think it was slow for an airplane. it disappeared off to the east toward birmingham more quickly though after it slowly went across the highway. the whole event may have lasted 5 minutes. i am not saying that i saw an alien but we did see something! after the object was out of sight and we headed on our way we agreed that it was just like something you would see on tv. i have never reported anything before and probably won't again. i know it sounds strange but it is true.
content.summary: Black object with lights moving slowly changed direction came closer to me

content.detailedDescription:
Address object observed from: 560 e south temple salt lake city, ut 84102
time of observation: 2/28/2014, between 11:50 am - 12:00 pm

i was leaving a get together with some friends on the night of february 28th, 2014. it had just finished raining and there were patches of clouds in the sky. i looked up to the sky in the east and noticed an orange light moving along a meandering path from south to north above the city. 

the light appeared to be a consistent ball or sphere of bright, orange light which illuminated the clouds around it brightly and left a trail behind it as it moved. at first i was under the impression that my vision had become blurry or that i was not seeing correctly due to the trail of light and aura the object gave off. i rubbed my eyes to clear them but noticed no change in my vision and the object persisted in the sky.

the object initially moved back and forth in the sky with no apparent direction, moving farther north as i watched but not more than a mile. the path did not seem to take it any great distance and it appeared to be staying in a general area, covering a portion of sky above the city. 

the object appeared to be at least as high as a propeller driven plan would typically fly above a city, a few hundred feet. likewise, it appeared to be no farther than a mile or two distant as the object seemed to be the size of a pencil eraser or aspirin in the sky. likewise, it appeared larger than a remote controlled model plane or helicopter. 

the object gave no apparent sound as it moved, no noise indicating a propeller or rotor was audible. after a minute or so of observation the light ascended into the clouds above it and disappeared.

this incident was caught on an iphone 4s. most of it was recorded save for a few moments after the initial sighting. you will notice the light blinking, this is due to its moving behind the branches of the tree i was standing in front of. the first portion of the video consists of the recording of the object. the second portion does not show the object, the camera was left on as i walked in the event that the object became visible once more.
content.summary: Glowing orange orb which illuminated nearby clouds and left trail of light.

content.detailedDescription:
These are a few photos i took with my nikon d5000 and with my nikon d5000 hooked to my nexstar 8 telescope..In feb of 2012 , the red egg shaped was taken a few months before .
i have no clue what they are one is a solid object sitting on the moon surface..Taken photos later it was gone .And the other was a red egg shaoed thing with seems like a ring around it ,,flying by the moon...
maybe you can figure out what these are ?
content.summary: Moon flyby and object landed on moon

content.detailedDescription:
My uncle was walking me out to my car this cool night in vegas, got in my car, cranked the engine lowered the window to continue speaking with my uncle, when a "helicopter like" lighting in the sky caught my eye,  the "navigation lights, looked really strange" they kind of swooshed green and red around the constant pulsating strobe, no notable pattern, got out of my car, told my uncle to look at it, explaining to him - that that was not a helicopter, it was at too high an altitude, while debating with him, i pulled my cellphone out and hit a/v record, the grouped together lights moved abruptly to the left, the acceleration and deceleration where highly unusual, fast, but smooth, my uncle kept saying, it's vegas, it's something from the casinos, i couldn't believe what he was telling me, he then said, he was cold and he was not going to wait for it to do something, he started walking away, i stopped recording, and it suddenly dropped in 1 second, and stopped right over the homes in the valley at about 500 feet and 2-3 miles north from my location, could still see it beyond the neighbors home and the trees, then it either disappeared or continued at that altitude, my skeptic uncle was not appeased, and was walking away, looked at him, looked back it was gone.

i used to fly as a private pilot, and know navigation lights, they don't swoosh, that'd be some very fancy led lighting on the hull, not to mentioned the smooth displacements, i wouldn't believe conventional aircraft would be able to withstand the g's i have just mentioned, perhaps a drone of some sort but, it would have hit the ground, it'd literally have to be antigravity driven to have avoided hitting the ground at the speed it achieved. the unintelligible part is why would it descended in the vicinity of mccarran airport/sunset park in a highly populated area, and area, i would have never thought to see a ufo here in vegas, i mean with nellis afb and area 51 nearby, i would have imagined we'd shoot them down immediately, specially if it's just hovering there in the middle of all sorts of air traffic.

this is the crazy part for the skeptics - i was glancing at the cellphone screen during recording and could see the neighbors home and the little dot - as seen on the screen, got home and reviewed the video, can't see anything, just audio =/, just weird, i guess my phone is on the fritz
content.summary: Was outside with my uncle, i said "you see that, that's not a helicopter"

content.detailedDescription: I was going to my moms at 7:22 about to go into her house then i was playing around checking my messages  and my brother noah asked to see the stars so  i put the google stars and planets app on and we looked up at the sky we saw orion but then we saw 5 blinking lights and we checked my phone and none of the lights were on my phone i looked then we saw 5 mins that the lights just vanished and i went in the house and thought and thought then i reported time later
content.summary: I was using my phone app that traced all stars and constellations then i look up and checked my phone and the 5 light weren't one of the stars or planets they were unidentified

content.detailedDescription:
It was the summer of 1984 (july or august); i was a 34 year old musician, on my way home from a private party my band had played for, held in a barn in a rural area about 45 minutes north of pittsburgh. the rest of the band stayed to visit with party hosts and guests but i wanted to get home to my daughter so i left about 11pm. i had no health problems, was not experiencing any stress, have no history of mental illness or substance abuse, was not overly tired, and had not been drinking. the job had gone well and i was happy and relaxed though vigilant as i was driving on a windy, unfamiliar 2 lane country road with no street lights. i was driving a vega station wagon, with clear view of the road behind; the speed limit was 35 mph but i was only going about 30 mph. 

i was about 10 minutes on the road when i suddenly saw the glow of a red light in my rear view mirror. it appeared to be immediately (literally, inches), behind the car, at the level of the top of my back seat. my first reaction was, ah man, it's a cop, and i was going to get a ticket. there was no place to pull over, and no other cars on the road so i just put my flashers on and brought the car to a stop. on my left on the other side of the road was a steep grassy hill about 10 feet high, at the top of which was a large field (about 5-6 acres i'd guess) with a farmhouse about 100 feet in the distance. beyond the farm house were woods with tall trees.  the only light i recall in the farmhouse was a porch light. i rolled my window down and reached for my purse to get my driver's license etc  when i started to realize there was something wrong with this picture. the red light remained in the same position behind me but wasn't blinking like a police car would, there was no policeman in sight, i hadn't been driving over the speed limit, and the red glow was so bright, i couldn't see past it to visualize a police car. i wasn't frightened at that point, just very confused. i sat there for maybe 1-2 minutes, looking at the light in my rear view mirror, when i heard a soft hum and the red light slowly lifted straight up out of my view. i had a terrible uh-oh feeling, leaned out of the open driver side window, looked up, and saw the underside of a round, grey, metallic craft of some sort hovering about 2 feet above my car. it was approximately 6-8 feet in diameter. now i was scared, petrified actually. i brought myself quickly back through the open window, and sat there quite paralyzed, wondering what the hell it was and what i should do: drive away fast, be still and hope it went away, etc. it hovered for maybe another 1-2 minutes, then moved slowly toward the hill where it stopped again. now i had a clear view of the craft - circular with a dome about 4-5 feet in height, and a pair of oblong structures on the back of either side (facing me). they were about 6 feet long, pointed on top and bottom, wider in the middle, with large well defined red lights in the middle part, and not well defined, smaller white lights flanking the red lights too & bottom. the metal of the light structures was lighter and shinier than the body of he craft. it hovered there for a very short time, less than a minute, then took off straight above the farmhouse and over the surrounding woods at warp peed, leaving nothing but a light trail behind it. it made no sound as it flew off. i jumped out of the car and ran up the hill to see where it went but it was gone by the time i reached the top.  i thought about going to the farmhouse to see if anyone was there and if they saw it but was shaking all over by then. i got back in my car and drove fast back to the main road, full of fear that whatever it was might come back. it didn't and i've never seen anything like it since. i have a sketch of what i saw; i don't how to get it to you electronically but would be glad to mail it. 

over the years i've confided the experience to 4 friends but never officially reported it to police or other government agency because frankly, it was such a close encounter and so outrageous, i didn't think anyone would believe me. i wrote it off to an amazing life experience and put it behind me until watching hanger one on tv this week; it was the first time i'd heard of mufon, checked out your web site, and decided to report my experience. it was a long time ago but i remember every detail like it was yesterday. i hope someone will find it useful to know.
content.summary: Hovered behind then above my car, then straight away at high speed.

content.detailedDescription: Transparent human like entity seen 30-50 ft from us. a clear outline of the figure could be seen from the head to the mid chest. the figure appeared transparent as light shinning on the bushes directly behind the figure from an adjacent house porch light could be seen. the figure moved toward my friend and i. as i began to step toward the figure, i heard the foot steps of my friend running away.  it was at this point tha it occurred to me that moving toward the figure might not be a good idea. i then ran after my friend. we have not seen anything like it again. i am submitting this report because i want to know if anyone has seen anything like this before.
content.summary: We witnessed a humanoid like figure which appeared transparent and moved toward us.

content.detailedDescription:
I had been sleeping when i was awakened by several lazer-like red beams which seemed to come from the direction of the tv across the room.  the red beams spread out and lit the room with a light so intense it reminded me of pyrotechnics. as the light scattered, it collected in the corners along the walls and ceiling and bounced around (similar to sparklers) before dissipating. in the next moment i was aware of a tall thin human shaped being to the right of my bed.  he was wearing head to toe black with some kind of sparkles all over but not an intense covering of sparkles. as i was processing what i was seeing i was not fearful, primarily due to the sparkles which in my mind ruled out a criminal element. the sparkles could have even been residual from the light that predicated the appearance of the being. as these thoughts were going through my mind, i hid my face and then decided to take another look and raised my head. he was standing in the same place on the far side of my bed to the right, about 6 feet from me.  his arms were crossed in front of his chest but i didn't notice his hands, nor could i see the lower legs.  as he stood there with arms crossed, he took a step forward with one foot and turned his head to the left to look at me.   i put my head down again and when i looked up a moment later, he was gone.  rather anticlimactic. but i often wonder if he'll be back.  so many questions haunt me with no answers.  the next day, as i was trying to make sense of it, there was no question that it was not a figment of my imagination, although i had never heard of a tall, black e.T., at least not yet.  so i googled 'tall thin black alien' and found several similar sightings, but most were in europe and i am in texas. one was so similar it was described as having a sheen in lieu of sparkles. but that sighting was 20 years ago and during the day.  so all things considered,
everything i have learned since my sighting has added credibility to my experience.  i only wish there was some way to exchange thoughts with my visitor.
content.summary: 6.5ft thin black humanoid preceeded by light rays then intense light which collected in corners of the room.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck having a cigarette when i saw a large boomerang or triangle delta shaped craft made up of 10-12 yellowish lights. i could see it block out the sky as it passed because it fly 'under" the constellation orion. i saw the same craft approximately 3 nights ago in the same general area. it passed over my house quickly and headed in a roughly south direction where it faded from view. it moved silently and quickly in a straight line before passing from my view. i noticed it just by looking up at the stars and towards the moon like i usually do when i am outside at night. i did not have any reactions that i could tie directly into the object.
content.summary: Large boomerang or wing shaped craft

content.detailedDescription:
On the fourth floor of my apartment balcony i see these lights quite often but they are too far to get an idea of their exact location. they get extremely bright, fade away completely, zoom off and appear out of nowhere. i thought they were helicopters but after i pointed them out to a few friends one night, we came to the consensus that they were not. the lights can move around each other as a pair, take turns approaching and then quickly moving away from a lone stationary light but what i can't explain is how one can appear out of nowhere while i am watching another depart to the southwest. 

i want to state this carefully, i am a skeptic because i've seen so many fraudulent claims. as a psychology student and prior member of the u.S. air force, it's rare that i fall for much, hook, line and sinker as it pertains to craft in the skies but these have me stumped. further than that, i do notice that they dim when i think about going inside to grab somebody else and get brighter if i just try to enjoy the mystery. not sure what that means but maybe i'll come across the subject in school soon!
content.summary: Multiple sightings for over e year. 4 to 5 lights at a time, moving around, toward and away from eachother.

content.detailedDescription: I was going into my apartment which is on the 1st floor when i looked over my left shoulder into the sky and notice 6 to 10 bright reddish orange lights just popping up into the sky from nowhere. they where moving real slow and close together so i automatically knew they were not airplanes 2 or 3 of the lights just stopped in mid air for about 2 minutes and then flew slowly together to the east when another then another just popped into the sky from nowhere and fly close together from east to west. the objects flew in a group of three's real close together traveling from east to west i then pulled out my cell phone to try and get video of the objects but it was a new cell phone and i really didn't know how to work it but i do think i captured something on it.The objects then flew east to west and popped out just like they popped in when i notice a helicopter flying around which i assumed looking for the lights that i saw also a fast moving airplane was in the area that flew back and forth from east to west.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 to 10 ufo flying east to west redishorange lights

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 4:30 am to get ready for work.  i made a pot of coffee which takes approximately 10 to 12 minutes to brew.  after watching tv for 10 minutes , i got up from my chair and went into the kitchen to fix a cup of coffee.  as i was stirring my cup of coffee , a thought came to my mind .  this is october , it's a beautiful morning outside , no moon , crisp and clear with millions of stars in the night sky .  so i decided to step out onto the back porch and look for satellites or anything else that i might could see that was unusual.  within a minute i caught movement out of my perihphial vision to the west.   i spotted a starlike object that was somewhat low in the sky as i turn to the west .  it moved from my right to my left in a straight line which took approximately eight seconds and stopped .  the object was bright like a star with no visible markings or shape characteristics whatsoever.  essentially it was too far away to notice any other details.   the vehicle stopped for approximately eight seconds and then turned downward and moved in a circular flight path .  the spacecraft completed 80% of this circular maneuver and then stopped for another 8 to 10 seconds.   at this point the bright spacecraft then seemed to be powering up as it became larger and brighter.  after another 8 to 10 seconds of powering up, the spacecraft emanated a bright white beam from the front of the ship which created a large circular bright white energy field.  another 8 to 10 seconds went by and the spacecraft then got twice as big and twice as bright.  the spacecraft then accelerated forward with the speed of light as it entered the circular bright white energy field known as a wormhole .  the spacecraft did not exit on the other side ,it simply vanished inside this energy field.   i then watched this bright white circular energy field slowly shrink in size until it got to the point as if you blew out a candle.  i heard no sounds whatsoever during this event.  i was in the right place at the right time.   the alien spacecraft that i saw was 100% true and accurate.  absolutely nothing man-made about the object that i spotted that sky.
we are not alone and albert einstein was so correct in his theories about wormholes .
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw an alien spacecraft fly, maneuver , open a wormhole and leave earth .  circular bright white wormhole than shrunk to nothing.

content.detailedDescription: Left my home to pick up dinner. i proceeded north on fairmont dr then turned right on santa ana canyon rd. where i noticed a single light traveling east being followed by a helicopter. the helicopter and it's structure were clearly visible against a backdrop of high clouds, and the helicopter displayed two sets of lights, one in the rear and one in the front with some solid lights and some flashing. the helicopter was following the light ahead at a fairly close distance, maybe as little as 100 feet. the helicopter was changing position in relationship to the object as if trying to view it from different angles. the light did not have any associated structure, only just the light. i would have been able to see any unlit structure since i could clearly see the entire helicopter against the backdrop of the cloud cover reflecting the city lights. they were flying at a high speed, moving from my position east through the canyon and into the corona area in the time it took me to drive a few blocks at 45 to 50 mph.  they flew out of sight to the east.
content.summary: Saw single white light being followed by helicopter at fairly high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: Arkansas mufon field investigator #16648 submitting for two eastern oklahoma witnesses. the young couple had stayed up to observe a rare planetary alignment with their children in the autumn of 1977. they went indoors about midnight and were preparing for bed when out the second story window they observed a large (about fifty feet long ten or more feet thick) bullet shaped object with emission flames in the rear, swoop silently down from the west, level off near the far end of an 18 acre field, about a quarter mile to the north, transit the field/border trees at just above treetop level at approximately 100 mph speed, then ascend at a steep angle and increased speed disappear eastward. they never made an official report but readily discussed the event with friends and neighbors. some friends in texas did make a secondhand report but the experiencers do not remember the name of the organization it was reported to.
content.summary: Bullet shaped object with various colored emission flames, descended from west leveled off across field/wooded area, then ascended and flew rapidly away eastwerd

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i live on a high elevation on the island of guam.  in our car we headed into town.
we noticed a beautiful full moon.  i stopped on mountain road so she could take a photo.
then moved approx 20 feet forward in car trying for a better shot.
window was down in car,  car was stopped.
we did not notice anything at the time.  later,  i looked at the photos.  one shows an orb.
the other does not.  the camera used was on my cell phone.  i have no idea what the orb is.
it is odd enough looking i thought i should provide it to mufon .   
all info regarding description are from the photo.  neither my wife or myself noticed the orb at the time the photos were taken.  
guam has a large airforce and navy base .
the orb looks like a small moon,  but way too large to be a planet or star.

i have the photos in my cell phone and do not know how to attach to this.
if you desire to see the photos,  send me a request to the email above,  and i will send to you right away.

best regards.
content.summary: Took photo of full moon.  moved approx 20 feet for another photo. an orb shows in one photo , not the other.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside having a cigarette and talking my cell phone. i was just looking at the clouds and a orange light blinked on. it was bright and moving slowly. it was about the size of a golfball if my arm was stretched out. i ran in and woke up my husband and he came out and saw it as well. he agrees it was a ufo. it was beneith the low clouds and not radiating off them like the helicopter that flew south a few minutes earlier. i tried to film it with my phone but it didnt show in my viewfinder. then after watching it for several second it blinked off. it had no sound and the lights did not change. i could not see shape because the lights were so bright.
content.summary: Bright orange light turned on moving northward slowly. a helicopter had passed a few minutes earlier very low and loud. husband also witness to ufo. object just blinked off.

content.detailedDescription:
Multicolored flashing orb/light over se colorado- approximately centennial area. remained stationary for 1 hour or so then ascended maybe 1/2 mile and is still there now at 10:45pm march 2nd as i post this. it looks hexagonal but that might just be the reflection of the lens; probably a flashing light ball. full spectrum of colors; blue/green/orange/yellow/red/violet. i was outside with the dog and looked up as always and there it appeared; it blends perfectly with the stars so i got lucky. 2 others in the household witnessed it.
stopped observing it around 11pm.
 it was just the altitude of a airliner jet so wonder what they were seeing!
2nd sighting in less than a month.
peace!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multi colored flashing orb/light over se colorado- with videos

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were just getting in our sleeping bags in the back of a truck. there were about twenty of our parents friends drinking and partying around camp fire. when an ufo came over the mountain that was across from the river we were camped on. there were no trees on that side of river it was a bare hill. this object was enormous! bigger then the mountain it came over. it proceeded very slow over mountain and directly over our camp., it had triangular shaped lights all over the bottom, as though there were smaller triangular shaped ships on bottom. the lights were red green and yellow triangular patterns. with white lightest around them. it simple made a humming sound and flew rite over us, there were pine trees on our side so rite after it went over us we could not see it anymore. no one remembered this object the next day in fact for two weeks , until i guess our memories came back. and we all started talking about it.
content.summary: Camping at boca lake next to truckee an object as big as the mountain flew directly over

content.detailedDescription: Not sure what it is these images were seen as i was going to delete landscape photos taken by my daughter months earlier. i was going to delete them from many photos or as i was deleting photos and something looked  peculiar so i blew up area of photos that had these things and can't explain what they are so i'm sending them to you. they were taken with iphone 4s they two photos with orbs in sky and one in grass in day time and another rectangular cloud like or silver box shaped evervesent with antennae . if you call i can email shots from phone if they don't appear or this attachment doesn't pick them up?
content.summary: I only think it's a ufo after i was going to delete some photos my daughter took months previous still not certain that's why i want mufon to look at them. they were taken on iphone and were originally just landscape shots of fall colors only n

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting down watching tv. my son yen noticed 3 bright lights flying towards us. we went outside to see, and it was extremely low. it then turned sharply and you could see the triangular shape of it. it then flew away
content.summary: Came from west  and came towards me

content.detailedDescription: My stepdad at the time my brother and myself were headed from our house just west of houston missouri to my mothers work on b hwy toward raymondville one evening after supper. as we were driving along i just happened to notice 2 red lights moving high in the evening sky february so already dark. i thought they were planes but the lights were not flashing and the odd part was that when one would move the other would also like they were connected but looked quite a ways apart. we arrived at my mothers work and went in for 30 mins and then i went out to wait at the car to head home and then i saw the lights again coming back toward houston from raymondville direction. i went and told my step dad and brother and we hopped in the car and followed best we could and as we got into houston thought it may be headed to airport so we went back way round as our house was close to airport , as we did we lost sight of the lights and travelled down airport road to see if it may have been a plane but nothing. we decided to go home but when we came up to the intersection of hawthorne and airport road hovered the two red lights at tree height. we pulled into the church parking lot and i jumped out as did they i walked out into the parking lot and a faint red light appeared to make a triangle no sound no wind nothing. then camera flashes from within the 3 lights  15 to 20 seconds of flashes then the top light faded out the two original lights started up hawthorn st and i ran to the street to watch and when they got to the next street it shot into the sky at light speed with no streak or tracer. shocked we jumped in the car and headed to house i immediately ran up onto the roof and there on the horizon were two red lights being followed by a recognizable aircraft. i watched until i couldn't see them any longer and stayed a long while with no other sighting. i went to the airport the next day and talked to a pilot to see if anyone had mentioned anything and he said he had heard of nothing. i was 16 at the time and remember it like it was yesterday.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 invisibly connected red lights camera flashes

content.detailedDescription: Was outside on patio when i observed what looked like a bright star so i watched for a while being an avid sky watcher when it then started to fade out was gone for about 5 minutes then slowly faded back into sight as it got brighter and brighter i looked for the telltale signs of a plane or helicopter such as running lights but was to high for any flight path that i know of not to mention it was stationary. it lasted for about two hours then just faded out before sunrise not sure what i saw but i kno it was no plane or helicopter
content.summary: Pulsating light over the atlantic

content.detailedDescription: We were in south jackson tn around 12 midnight in fall of 2001. observed a triangle shaped object come in from the northeast . it made no sound of any type . was slow moving. it stopped over the top of us momentarily. and then moved off towards the southwest. it was at least 100 ft. from corner to corner. and hovered 100 too 200 ft. off of the ground.
content.summary: Triangle shape with one light on each corner

content.detailedDescription: While standing in the front yeard of my parents home in woodbridge ca. with my nephew tim, him being of a young age we were watching satellites moving across a very clear and star filled heaven's .Tim was about fourteen year's of age ,me i was in ny late thirtys , this was in the late eightys when this spectacular event took place.As i stated tim and i were standing out in the early summer night watching satellites cross the night sky, theywere about ffifteen minutes apart or so, having a good one on one conversation with my young nephew, one of many as i come from a family of five brothers and four sisters,tim has grown up around me so we spent a lit of time together and this particular night i was telling him somewhat the way satellites functioned and there purposes, so we would wait for the next to fly over and follow it until we no longer could see it as it went out if site, the pattern of flight for what we were observing was from south to the north, as we were watching mabe the fourth or fifth one if the night , it was about a little past the halfway mark above us going north when we observed one coming from the northwest going south southeast,i don't recall who saw it first but weboth kinda said tthere's one going the other way , it was coming up from the lower horizon travelling at the speed of all other satellites and as it approached the high point above our heads it made a almost ninety degree turn and at the speed of a falling star it flew to the north west with amazing speed , tim and i both like shouted out, did you see that ? r running into the house to tell others what we had just experienced, and thirty years later i still tell people my experience that night often referring to my nephew tim for confirmation of that night.
content.summary: Appeared to be a satelite moving in a differant direction frim otger satelites.

content.detailedDescription: While walking my dogs, i noticed a 4th of july sparkler like light, observing it from top down like a point of light. my observation included normal stars nearby. i then watched a fixed point on my house, it never moved! then i noted the time and on the next 2 nights checked the same position to see if it was a star. no stars were located anywhere near the sky location. i did see a video showing a ufo that looked exactly like what i saw. this was a minor event, but i felt i should reort what i saw.
content.summary: Observed in the skt

content.detailedDescription: On the way home from city of st. louis going to chesterfield, mo., i noticed ma grouping of lights to the north west as i drove west on hwy 40 approaching hwy 270.  as i got closer, there was two groupings of lights and a noticable red pulsatiing "dome" on the grouping of lights nearest me.  the closer i got, the more detail i could make out...The "head" seemed to have 8 or 10 white "windows" across the front and a count of four or five levels (floors?) down ... the back area seemed to have a light panel with points of light and random pulsing of stronger light within the light panel.  there seemed to be a secondary such panel on the north side of the first.  as i passed the clustering, it seemed like i could make out a bottom, "flatbed" type structure that might be the body connecting the two (three) groupings of lights.  my mind was saying "like a cruise ship in the sky" and "like fireball xl5" from my childhood.  as i passed it, there didn't seem to be any back lights.  i was unable to immediately stop to shoot video, but i turned around at mason road and came all the way back east on 40 to spoede road, parked, got my canon xa 10 out.  by this time, if what i spotted was the ufo, it had moved considerably north (several miles).  i shot some video and as i couldn't see it anymore, there was a plane flying into view from the east and i shot some video of that to show the difference in lights between the two.  this all occurred between 9:40 and 9:50(?) pm on friday night, february 28, 2014.  submitted here friday night but it didn't take for some reason.  will be submitting video and research later when
content.summary: Spotted group of lights on way home on hwy 40 and hwy 270 n of hwy 40.

content.detailedDescription: It was the afternoon and i was at home. i wanted to watch some tv before work. i only have an antenna that receives basic digital channels on my tv, and i could not find the remote so i was standing at the tv manually changing the channels to find something to watch. i stopped on channel 13, because it was coming in the best. there was a little interference, so i adjusted the antenna a little bit, which caused the sound to stop coming in clearly. it was no longer the sound from what was airing on tv, but something weird and different i could not make out. i put my ear a little closer and thought it might be worth recording so i pulled my cell phone out and set it to record sound. at first i had the phone up to the tv speaker, but it did not sound loud enough so i raised the volume on my cell phone, and turned on the surround sound speakers at a higher volume. i continued to record it and wondered if it was the sound from the tv just being distorted, or something else (alien sounding). it was like "predators" were talking. i use this comparison because it did not sound human, and its the closest sounding example i could think of. i kept recording for a minute or two, and compared the sound to what i was seeing on the tv screen. they did not coincide with one another at all. i decided to change the channel to see if it would change, and it did once i got to channel 10. i went back to channel 13 and the sound was coming in perfectly clear from what was airing on tv. i was no longer hearing what i recorded. very weird, and interesting. i feel i may have caught some transmission between an unidentified being.
content.summary: Rotating tv antennas and this transmission came through speakers instead of tv sound.
